rules_text:
[i]Divine[/i] – When Guinevere, Princess of Peace enters, exile target creature until Guinevere leaves the battlefield.
[i]Princess of Bern[/i] – Whenever a creature you control with flying enters, create a Monster role token attached to that creature. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.)[/i]
[i]The Fire Emblem[/i] – As long as you control five or more other Nobles, creatures you control get +3/+3.
